name: Slajmtajm
description:
Earth has been abandoned.
Ever since the slimes invaded, life has been unsustainable.
After many attempts to combat their siege, the few remaining survivors fled.

There's only you left.

Blurb

Hi everyone!
This is my first game in many years, so I'm glad I managed to get something made.
I made this game for LOWREZJAM 2020 where the main rule is for the resolution to be 64x64. I hope you have some fun with it!
Please give any and all feedback in the comments :)

Controls Left-click: Use tool / Break block Right-click: Place block Scroll: Select item W: Jump A: Left D: Right C: Craft Z: Drop Credits

I'd like to thank my friends for being supportive, playtesting, and coming up with fun ideas for the game. You guys know who you are :)
Extra thanks to Savepoints for helping to come up with the concept for the slimes.
The rest (code, music and art) were done by me. You can find the main soundtrack on my WeeklyBeats submission.
